name: Death by Dream
description:
Death By Dream

Claire has always had unpleasant nightmares, ever since she was young. Experience the blurred line between her dreams and reality in this story-driven game.

Trigger warnings: violence, suicide.

-

A game by Florencia Minuzzi from Tea-Powered Games (@teapoweredteam), made with PRGMaker VX Ace.

Dreamscape song by Romy (@soundslikeromy)

Runtime: Approximately 2 hours.

Currently only works on Windows, but you can use Wine to play it on OS X or Linux.
